title: Does Colin need to start over?
post:
Does reader seriously imagine that a scorch mark is permanent for all time? Has reader never used the hydrogen peroxide trick to remove an ironing scorch? Yup, that’s all that’s needed to bleach a scorch – a source of active oxygen. Ground level ozone probably works too, even ordinary atmospheric oxygen if you are prepared to wait decades – or centuries…
It’s all explainable in terms of conjugated double bonds, chromophores etc etc but I’ll spare you a chemistry lesson.
